title: Kinetics of the Reactions of the Criegee Intermediate CH2OO with Water Vapour: Experimental Measurements as a Function of Temperature and Global Atmospheric Modelling
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00097H, Paper

Rachel Lade, Mark Blitz, Matthew Rowlinson, Mathew John Evans, Paul Seakins, Daniel Stone
The kinetics of reactions between the simplest Criegee intermediate, CH2OO, and water vapour have been investigated at temperatures between 262 and 353 K at a total pressure of 760 Torr...
